mapper.update: MERGE INTO cmnt USING DUAL ON(midx=#{mIdx} AND memid=#{memid}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET ccon = #{cCon}, cdate = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT VALUES( CMNT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mIdx}, #{memid}, #{cCon}, TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') )
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, u.mname FROM cmnt c JOIN users u ON c.memid = u.memid WHERE midx = #{mIdx} ORDER BY c.cdate DESC
